name: FileTree
summary: A file tree similar to opsplorer
description:
A file tree exporer based on the tree.vim script.
Since version 1.0 it has CD command and directory stack similar to shell's one.
You can use RFileTree command to split it on the right side of the window or similar LFileTree,BFileTree,TFileTree commands. FileTree command uses default values for placing window.

I will gladly accept any \(comments\|bug reports\|request for feature\)\+
install_details:
To install this plugin you have to have tree.vim script installed.
If you have it installed then unpack archive to a vim directory.
And ofcouse use :helptags <doc.dir>
Where <doc.dir> - directory where you have unpacked doc/FileTree.txt

versions.release_notes: Now it is work for systems with backslashes in paths. Added "CD" command and directory stack. Fixed coloring for terminal users.Also added few options and commands to show window up on any side.
